name: Chroma Blast (itch)
description:
In Chroma Blast you will be testing your reflexes to shoot down as many enemies as you can to get the best score you can. Avoid shooting enemies that have the same color as your projectiles so that you can eliminate them as quickly as possible.

Chroma Blast was originally created during the Ludum Dare 34 game jam under the name Vector Color War. Since then Chroma Blast has been released on the Nintendo Wii U, and has a Steam Greenlight campaign.

Chroma Blast features 2 types of game modes Normal, and Survival. Also has Xbox 360/Xbox One Controller support.
